overview: Wu Xiaoxuan of the WeChat account of Pippi shrimp applied for a hotel attendant, but was eliminated by the hotel vice president Fan Ye because he was not a Virgo, and was humiliated by the hotel beauty appraiser Han Cheng. The accident made Wu Xiaoxuan the president of the hotel, and the revenge operation began. Wu Xiaoxuan was exposed by Fan Ye, but she unexpectedly received Han Cheng's support, and became Han Cheng's lover somehow. The two began a strange and forced love.
title: Phi Phi Shrimp President
